Describe the change and affected skills.

## Type of change

- [ ] New skill
- [ ] Existing skill improvement

## Validation

- [ ] Script syntax checks (`bash -n`) passed
- [ ] Workflow tested in preview/read-only mode
- [ ] No unrelated files changed

## Safety

- [ ] Mutating operations remain explicitly gated (`--yes`)
- [ ] No secrets or sensitive data included
- [ ] Prompt-injection and unsafe command execution risks considered
